name: Illegal Enlightenment
description:
Collect Bulbus Divinorum, pronounced as /bʌlbʌs dɪˈvʌɪnɔːʌm/, some illegal plant on some alien planet out there. Will you eat enough Bulbi to reach enlightenment, illegal enlightenment?

CONTROLS: W, A, S, D,  mouse buttons

TIP: Throw bulbus at the police to stop them.

Everything except the music was made with LibGDX in 72 hours.

WARNING: The visual effects might make you feel slightly nauseous.

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Xenotropix
